mapper.select: select count(*) from noticeboard where ${itemcd} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from( select notice_seq, lag(notice_seq, 1, 0) over(order by notice_seq desc) prev_num, lag(notice_subject, 1, '이전글이 없습니다') over (order by notice_seq desc) prev_subject, lead(notice_seq,1,0) over (order by notice_seq desc) next_num, lead(notice_subject, 1, '다음글이 없습니다') over (order by notice_seq desc) next_subject from noticeboard) where notice_seq=#{notice_seq}
